text: <@U05KNCMAE7N> any chance you can help me get access to these designs as well? I already have access to CRM development tools.

I also wanted to join the beta for UI extensions for public apps. When I click the <https://hubs.la/Q02Pd1CB0|attached link> on the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/build-app-cards|developer’s site> it says the product update was not found.

I am using a developer test account for this and have Super Admin access.
Hey all, I’ll try and assist here. Can one of you share you developer test portal id with me?

~Sure, my developer Portal ID is 145437528.~

I have two accounts:
• Developer account with the ID: 145437326 
• Test account with the ID: 145437528
<@U02BW35KW7J> can you confirm this is an app developer account? As I am seeing that portal id to be a normal customer account
<@U07MSERPF43> please try using: 145437326 to access the product update and submit.
<@U01QVR44MEY> can you try again on accessing the product update to get into the UIE Public App beta

This is a customer account, previously I'd enroll customer accounts in this beta to get the new CRM development tab to set up new projects and such with react cards, is this beta not for customer portals anymore?

The UIE for Public Apps beta is intended for App Developer Accounts. There is also the private apps beta which is here:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/crm-customization>

I think for the customers case, it might be a private app. If you are instead, saying that this customer wants to create a public app of their own for HubSpots App Marketplace, then you would need to have an App Developer Account for that customer where you can then signup for the UIE Public Apps Beta.

Please let me know if that helps clarify this more for you :slightly_smiling_face:
Does the customize the CRM beta have a different slack channel? Additionally do Both the public apps beta and the private app beta use the same react components?
Also when I click on that above link and try and register the customer portal it says not found

> Does the customize the CRM beta have a different slack channel?
Nope, this is the right channel for both the betas :slightly_smiling_face: We renamed this channel, but you're in the right place.

>  Additionally do Both the public apps beta and the private app beta use the same react components?
Yes, they use the same UI Components:white_check_mark:
Okay perfect, I still need some help then getting into the private customer beta then since I can't find it in the betas and the above link didn't work
Does the portal you are using have Sales or Service Hub Enterprise?
Oh I see they're only on sales pro
So the private apps beta is only sales or service enterprise?
Yes! To create private apps one needs to have Sales or Service enterprise
Public app cards can be installed in any org correct?
Hey <@U05KNCMAE7N>, would it be possible to access these Figma files, please?

*React + GraphQL Custom Card > Add editing components*
Hi all!
I'm working on a react + graphQl Custom Card.
I've 3 different object related A -> B and B -> C
Into the view I attached I can list all B objects related do A and all C objects related to each B object.

Now I need to edit some fields, in B objects and C objects.
I would like to use a component like one with green arrow.
Is it possible?
